title: Trying to sign into Epson support site being blocked by Malwarebyes as malware!
content: I just got a new Epson 3-in-one printer and tried to sign up for the warranty. I got a message that the warranty was expired... I went to the Epson support site on Firefox and Malwarebytes blocked the site as malware... It said I could add the site as approved, but I don't know how to do that. "https://www.epsoncom.com/my-account/home". The Epson site said I already had an account but my password was incorrect. I had an Epson printer more than ten years ago; I don't remember the password and they don't provide an option to reset it. HELP, PLEASE.
creator: BTINAZ

title: I want to add a link to Paypal
content: I need to link my netbank account to Paypal.

title: Lost Backups
content:
I recently had to do a hard reset on my Windows 11 PC. When I reinstalled Firefox, tried to retrieve my bookmarks, they are not there. Is there anyway to retrieve those book marks from 6 months ago?

V
creator: shicks1508

title: Bookmark Sync not working
content:
I upgraded to Windows 11 yesterday. I have always been logged in to Firefox with my email, so I thought the bookmarks will come back once I log in on the new windows, but that didn't happen. Some of these bookmarks are work related, so they're fairly important.

Although I'm using the same email, my profile picture is gone too—replaced with a default one. (Not AI generated sentence. I just like using Em dashes)

What could have happened and what can I do to get my bookmarks back? I appreciate any suggestion you can give me.

Thank you in advance.
creator: brightfulfuture999

title: ai chat bot microphone permissions
content: hey i cant seem to figure out why the tab for the ai chat bot on the left hand side of the screen can not access my microphone.. i like to use google gemini and my microphone registers fine if i go directly to geminis website in my fire fox browser. but when i use the integrated tab on firefox it will not register my mic
creator: rider0243

title: Lost all tabs after factory reset on phone
content:
Recently had to get my phone repaired and did a backup beforehand (and Firefox sync was on) but when I restored my data Firefox was empty, all tabs gone. Is there any way to get them back? And if not, any way to prevent this in the future? (I did look into my history, there are no previous tabs closed)

Thank you in advance!
creator: asgn98

title: Outlook Sign-in
content: Since the last Firefox update, I am unable to sign into my Outlook account. When I click "Sign In" it opens a new tab with the sign-in buttons. Works fine in Edge and Chrome.
creator: RheaNL
